TopicTitle: Revert Antennae changes by Probes before Crew

Articles.Content: I am using Probes before Crew which alters the ranges of the stock antennae, but I also have NF Exploration installed that adds some new antennae. So I want to revert the tweaks by PBC to keep all the parts balanced. I found the Zs_ProbesBeforeCrew.cfg which seems to include the changes made to the antennae, but tweaking the values in there doesn't change anything in game. What am I doing wrong?
